Package hoipolloi

A free cross-platform contact management system.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
About The About Hoi Polloi Window.
Address An Address datatype consisting of Label, Address Line 1, 2, and 3, City, State, Zip, Country, District and Type (Residential, Billing, Mailing etc).
AddressType Stores Address Types
BrowserLauncher BrowserLauncher is a class that provides one static method, openURL, which opens the default web browser for the current user of the system to the given URL.
Business A datatype to store a business or company.
CharcoalTheme This class describes a theme using gray colors.
ColumnResizer A static class to resize a JTable's columns to suit the table contents.
Contact Stores Contacts for People This class however is not used to add or remove contacts from the database.
DarudeTheme This class describes a theme using orange colors.
DBConnection SQLite Database Connection Class.
DBHPInterface A class with various static methods to interact with the database.
Death A static class to delete things from the Hoi Polloi database.
Debug This class was made to display to the default output device if set to on.
ExcelExporter Export a JTable to an Excel (CSV) File.
Family A datatype for a family.
HPCellRenderer A Cell Renderer for Hoi Polloi Lists.
HPPictureEditor Hoi Polloi picture editor, mainly used to crop/resize pictures to fit the size specified by the program for the profile picture.
JImageLabel  
JTempFrame A temporary frame for showing lists of things.
KeyValue A KeyValue Class to store integer key and string value pairs.
Main The main entry point for the Hoi Polloi application.
MainMenu Draws the main application interface.
Person The Person Class stores people objects and has methods to send and retrieve their information from the database.
PrintUtilities A simple utility class that lets you very simply print an arbitrary component.
Profile The super class for all profile types.
RubyTheme This class describes a theme using red colors.
Search A Class to Perform Text Searches on the Hoi Polloi Database.
SearchWindow Shows a search window for searching the Hoi Polloi database.
Stats A static class containing various methods to get statistical data about the database.
VerticalFlowLayout A vertical flow layout is similar to a flow layuot but it layouts the components vertically instead of horizontally.
WatermarkPanel Displays a HP logo watermark in the main window.
 

Exception Summary
EmptyQueryException A custom Exception for an empty or null database query.
 

Package hoipolloi Description

A free cross-platform contact management system. Hoi Polloi is a people database program. Its main purpose to keep record of everyone one could possibly know in a meaningful and organized way. By having a program that is cross-platform and OS independent, you can keep all your contact information for everyone you know in one place.

Since:
November 2006
Version:
1.96 (December 13, 2007)
Author:
Brandon Tanner (Engine/Design/Database), Brandon Buck (Interface/Design/Layout)
